subject: Order from Argentina
description_text:
Hi! I really want to try your pedals from Argentina, but need to know wich
carrier is gonna be used with the different shipping options since that
makes customs costs and process different here.

Also, your clutch will be compatible with other brands 2-set pedals? since
I have friends that have simjack and simruito pedals but would love to add
your clutch if possible.

Thanks!

conversations.body_text: Hi Mateo Kot,  We do not recommend mixing our pedals with those from other brands, as it may lead to compatibility issues or improper functionality, affecting overall performance.

But its possible and is going to work?

Also and more important. Which carrier is going to be used in shipping?

El vie, 18 jul 2025, 03:34, service@simsonn.com

And you sell 200kg load cell replacement?

El vie, 18 jul 2025 a la(s) 8:51 a.m., Mateo Kot (mateomc10kot@gmail.com)
escribió:

> But its possible and is going to work?
>
> Also and more important. Which carrier is going to be used in shipping?
>
> El vie, 18 jul 2025, 03:34, service@simsonn.com

Hi Mateo Kot,    It is very inconvenient for us to ship to Argentina, it usually takes more than 10 days and expensive courier. We can't say for sure if it will be UPS or Fedex, but they will be air freight. Also, some customers have responded that they can use it with their Simjack, but they need to buy a Plus X control box and use our software.

ok, thanks, do you sell 200kg load cell replacement? is there anyway to
help me with a bigger discount coupon for this order? I promise to do a
review and promote your website in several simracing argentinian groups.
